**锁子甲**（chain mail）是[NetHack](/index.php?title=NetHack/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "NetHack/zh-CN (page does not exist)")中的一种[铠甲](/wiki/%E9%93%A0%E7%94%B2 "铠甲")类[防具](/wiki/%E9%98%B2%E5%85%B7 "防具")。它由[铁](/index.php?title=%E9%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "铁 (page does not exist)")制成。

[ ]

## 生成

[酋长](/index.php?title=%E9%85%8B%E9%95%BF\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "酋长 (page does not exist)")、[实习骑士](/index.php?title=%E5%AE%9E%E4%B9%A0%E9%AA%91%E5%A3%AB\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "实习骑士 (page does not exist)")、[禅师](/index.php?title=%E7%A6%85%E5%B8%88\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "禅师 (page does not exist)")和[战士](/index.php?title=%E6%88%98%E5%A3%AB\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "战士 (page does not exist)")生成时有2⁄3的概率[获得](/index.php?title=%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E8%B5%B7%E5%A7%8B%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "怪物起始物品 (page does not exist)")一件锁子甲[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)。

[野蛮人](/index.php?title=%E9%87%8E%E8%9B%AE%E4%BA%BA%EF%BC%88%E7%8E%A9%E5%AE%B6%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "野蛮人（玩家怪物） (page does not exist)")、[骑士](/index.php?title=%E9%AA%91%E5%A3%AB%EF%BC%88%E7%8E%A9%E5%AE%B6%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "骑士（玩家怪物） (page does not exist)")、[牧师](/index.php?title=%E7%89%A7%E5%B8%88%EF%BC%88%E7%8E%A9%E5%AE%B6%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "牧师（玩家怪物） (page does not exist)")和[女武神](/index.php?title=%E5%A5%B3%E6%AD%A6%E7%A5%9E%EF%BC%88%E7%8E%A9%E5%AE%B6%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "女武神（玩家怪物） (page does not exist)")职业的[玩家怪物](/index.php?title=%E7%8E%A9%E5%AE%B6%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "玩家怪物 (page does not exist)")在生成时有18⁄155（约11.61%）的概率[获得](/index.php?title=%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E8%B5%B7%E5%A7%8B%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "怪物起始物品 (page does not exist)")一件锁子甲[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)[\[3\]](#cite_note-3)[\[4\]](#cite_note-4)[\[5\]](#cite_note-5)。

*以下内容涉及即将到来的版本（[NetHack 3.7.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.7.0 "NetHack 3.7.0")）之信息。如果该版本已发布，请验证此处信息是否准确，并作出相应修改，以将其并入页面。*

现在[野蛮人](/index.php?title=%E9%87%8E%E8%9B%AE%E4%BA%BA\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "野蛮人 (page does not exist)")的[任务领袖](/index.php?title=%E4%BB%BB%E5%8A%A1%E9%A2%86%E8%A2%96\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "任务领袖 (page does not exist)")[珀利阿斯](/index.php?title=%E7%8F%80%E5%88%A9%E9%98%BF%E6%96%AF\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "珀利阿斯 (page does not exist)")生成时会获得一件+5锁子甲。

## 描述

锁子甲的基础[AC](/index.php?title=AC/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "AC/zh-CN (page does not exist)")加成为5，且能提供[MC](/index.php?title=MC/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "MC/zh-CN (page does not exist)")1。

## 策略

锁子甲是件不错的防具，但比较重，且会阻碍[施法](/index.php?title=%E6%96%BD%E6%B3%95\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "施法 (page does not exist)")。玩家若想在早期把AC压低，可以考虑利用锁子甲，直到找到更轻（例如[秘银胶衣](/wiki/%E7%A7%98%E9%93%B6%E8%83%B6%E8%A1%A3 "秘银胶衣")）或更适于施法（例如[嵌皮甲](/wiki/%E5%B5%8C%E7%9A%AE%E7%94%B2 "嵌皮甲")或[龙鳞甲](/wiki/%E9%BE%99%E9%B3%9E%E7%94%B2 "龙鳞甲")）的铠甲。

## 历史

锁子甲自[Jay Fenlason's Hack](/wiki/Jay_Fenlason%27s_Hack "Jay Fenlason's Hack")的衍生作品Hack 1.21和Hack for PDP-11开始就已存在于游戏中，也是[Hack 1.0](/wiki/Hack_1.0 "Hack 1.0")中最早加入游戏的物品之一。到[NetHack 3.2.3](/wiki/NetHack_3.2.3 "NetHack 3.2.3")为止，[牧师](/index.php?title=%E7%89%A7%E5%B8%88\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "牧师 (page does not exist)")职业的角色在游戏开始时会获得一件+0锁子甲，从[NetHack 3.3.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.3.0 "NetHack 3.3.0")开始则换成[长袍](/wiki/%E9%95%BF%E8%A2%8D "长袍")。

## 起源

[![维基百科](/images/thumb/f/f8/Fair-use-wikipedia-logo.png/50px-Fair-use-wikipedia-logo.png)](/wiki/File:Fair-use-wikipedia-logo.png "维基百科")

[维基百科](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/zh:Main_Page "wikipedia:zh:Main Page")相关条目：

***[Mail (armour)](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mail_\(armour\) "wikipedia:Mail (armour)")***

锁子甲由许多小型金属环相扣组成，在欧洲、亚洲、北美洲等地，自古罗马前至19世纪都有使用。在中世纪，此类护甲仅用“mail”一词称呼——自19世纪的历史小说开始，该词才被用来描述其他类型的护甲（这也促成了“chain mail”一词被发明出来以专门描述锁子甲）。

NetHack中的锁子甲的设定均来自《[龙与地下城](/index.php?title=%E9%BE%99%E4%B8%8E%E5%9C%B0%E4%B8%8B%E5%9F%8E\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "龙与地下城 (page does not exist)")》。

## Variants

**此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。**  
您可以帮助我们[**翻译此页面**](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Chain_mail/zh-CN\&action=edit)，但**请勿使用机器翻译**。

### SLASH'EM

In [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), the [Undead Slayer](/wiki/Undead_Slayer "Undead Slayer") has a 1⁄4 chance of starting with chain mail as their body armor. Orcish Undead Slayers that would start with chain mail as their body armor receive orcish chain mail instead, making use of the existing substitution.

A set of chain mail appears on the goal level of the [Yeoman quest](/wiki/Yeoman_quest "Yeoman quest"), placed on the [altar](/wiki/Altar "Altar") of the lawful [temple](/wiki/Temple "Temple").

[Upgrading](/wiki/Upgrading "Upgrading") orcish chain mail will produce regular chain mail, and vice versa.

### dNetHack

In [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack"), [notdNetHack](/wiki/NotdNetHack "NotdNetHack") and [notnotdNetHack](/wiki/NotnotdNetHack "NotnotdNetHack"), chain mail grants 2 base AC, 3 [DR](/wiki/DR "DR") and MC1 while worn, and its weight is reduced to 150 aum.

[Dwarven](/wiki/Dwarf_\(starting_race\) "Dwarf (starting race)") [Binders](/wiki/Binder_\(dNetHack_role\) "Binder (dNetHack role)") always start with [thoroughly rusty](/wiki/Erosion "Erosion") chain mail, while Dwarven and female [half-dragon](/wiki/Half-dragon_\(starting_race\) "Half-dragon (starting race)") [Nobles](/wiki/Noble "Noble") will always start with standard chain mail. All non-[Incantifier](/wiki/Incantifier_\(dNetHack_starting_race\) "Incantifier (dNetHack starting race)") Knights start the game with chain mail - incantifier Knights are given a [robe](/wiki/Robe "Robe") instead.

[Soldier ants](/wiki/Soldier_ant "Soldier ant") and [queen bees](/wiki/Queen_bee "Queen bee") generated on the [Lawful Quest](/wiki/Law_quest_\(dNetHack\) "Law quest (dNetHack)") have an effective 3⁄25 chance of generating with chain mail.

### xNetHack

In [xNetHack](/wiki/XNetHack "XNetHack"), [Croesus](/wiki/Croesus "Croesus") has a 7⁄8 chance of generating with [gold](/wiki/Gold_\(material\) "Gold (material)") chain mail.

### EvilHack

In [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"), [aligned champions](/wiki/Champion_\(monster\) "Champion (monster)") and [ronin](/wiki/Ronin "Ronin") have a 1⁄3 chance of generating with chain mail. Chain mail may also be generated as part of various kits for player monsters, including [centaurs](/index.php?title=Centaur_\(monster_attribute\)\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Centaur (monster attribute) (page does not exist)") (who can wear body armor in EvilHack).

Chain mail can be created at a [forge](/wiki/Forge_\(dungeon_feature\) "Forge (dungeon feature)") by combining two sets of [ring mail](/wiki/Ring_mail "Ring mail"). Chain mail can be used to forge a few items:

- Chain mail can be combined with [splint mail](/wiki/Splint_mail "Splint mail") to create [plate mail](/wiki/Plate_mail "Plate mail").
- Chain mail can be combined with [scale mail](/wiki/Scale_mail "Scale mail") to create splint mail.
- Chain mail can be combined with a [dwarvish roundshield](/wiki/Dwarvish_roundshield "Dwarvish roundshield") to create [dwarvish chain mail](/wiki/Dwarvish_chain_mail "Dwarvish chain mail").
- Chain mail can be combined with an [elven shield](/wiki/Elven_shield "Elven shield") to create [elven chain mail](/wiki/Elven_chain_mail "Elven chain mail").

### Hack'EM

In [Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM"), [giant](/wiki/Giant_\(starting_race\) "Giant (starting race)") Undead Slayers that would start with chain mail start with [low boots](/wiki/Low_boots "Low boots") instead, while [tortle](/wiki/Tortle_\(starting_race\) "Tortle (starting race)") Undead Slayers receive [leather gloves](/wiki/Leather_gloves "Leather gloves") in place of chain mail.

In addition to EvilHack details and forging recipes, upgrading orcish chain mail will produce regular chain mail and vice versa, as in SLASH'EM.

## 引用及注释

2. [↑](#cite_ref-2) [src/mplayer.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 174](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/mplayer.c#L174)

锁子甲（chain mail）是NetHack中的一种铠甲类防具。它由铁制成。

生成

酋长、实习骑士、禅师和战士生成时有2⁄3的概率获得一件锁子甲[1]。

野蛮人、骑士、牧师和女武神职业的玩家怪物在生成时有18⁄155（约11.61%）的概率获得一件锁子甲[2][3][4][5]。

以下内容涉及即将到来的版本（NetHack 3.7.0）之信息。如果该版本已发布，请验证此处信息是否准确，并作出相应修改，以将其并入页面。

现在野蛮人的任务领袖珀利阿斯生成时会获得一件+5锁子甲。

描述

锁子甲的基础AC加成为5，且能提供MC1。

策略

锁子甲是件不错的防具，但比较重，且会阻碍施法。玩家若想在早期把AC压低，可以考虑利用锁子甲，直到找到更轻（例如秘银胶衣）或更适于施法（例如嵌皮甲或龙鳞甲）的铠甲。

历史

锁子甲自Jay Fenlason's Hack的衍生作品Hack 1.21和Hack for PDP-11开始就已存在于游戏中，也是Hack 1.0中最早加入游戏的物品之一。到NetHack 3.2.3为止，牧师职业的角色在游戏开始时会获得一件+0锁子甲，从NetHack 3.3.0开始则换成长袍。

起源

维基百科相关条目：
Mail (armour)

锁子甲由许多小型金属环相扣组成，在欧洲、亚洲、北美洲等地，自古罗马前至19世纪都有使用。在中世纪，此类护甲仅用“mail”一词称呼——自19世纪的历史小说开始，该词才被用来描述其他类型的护甲（这也促成了“chain mail”一词被发明出来以专门描述锁子甲）。

NetHack中的锁子甲的设定均来自《龙与地下城》。

Variants

您可以帮助我们翻译此页面，但请勿使用机器翻译。

SLASH'EM

In SLASH'EM, the Undead Slayer has a 1⁄4 chance of starting with chain mail as their body armor. Orcish Undead Slayers that would start with chain mail as their body armor receive orcish chain mail instead, making use of the existing substitution.

A set of chain mail appears on the goal level of the Yeoman quest, placed on the altar of the lawful temple.

Upgrading orcish chain mail will produce regular chain mail, and vice versa.

dNetHack

In dNetHack, notdNetHack and notnotdNetHack, chain mail grants 2 base AC, 3 DR and MC1 while worn, and its weight is reduced to 150 aum.

Dwarven Binders always start with thoroughly rusty chain mail, while Dwarven and female half-dragon Nobles will always start with standard chain mail. All non-Incantifier Knights start the game with chain mail - incantifier Knights are given a robe instead.

Soldier ants and queen bees generated on the Lawful Quest have an effective 3⁄25 chance of generating with chain mail.

xNetHack

In xNetHack, Croesus has a 7⁄8 chance of generating with gold chain mail.

EvilHack

In EvilHack, aligned champions and ronin have a 1⁄3 chance of generating with chain mail. Chain mail may also be generated as part of various kits for player monsters, including centaurs (who can wear body armor in EvilHack).

Chain mail can be created at a forge by combining two sets of ring mail. Chain mail can be used to forge a few items:

  • Chain mail can be combined with splint mail to create plate mail.
  • Chain mail can be combined with scale mail to create splint mail.
  • Chain mail can be combined with a dwarvish roundshield to create dwarvish chain mail.
  • Chain mail can be combined with an elven shield to create elven chain mail.

Hack'EM

In Hack'EM, giant Undead Slayers that would start with chain mail start with low boots instead, while tortle Undead Slayers receive leather gloves in place of chain mail.

In addition to EvilHack details and forging recipes, upgrading orcish chain mail will produce regular chain mail and vice versa, as in SLASH'EM.

|cost=75 |weight=300 |material=铁 }} '''锁子甲'''（chain mail）是{{cnlink|NetHack}}中的一种[[铠甲]]类[[防具]]。它由[[铁]]制成。 == 生成 == [[酋长]]、[[实习骑士]]、[[禅师]]和[[战士]]生成时有{{frac|2|3}}的概率[[怪物起始物品|获得]]一件锁子甲{{refsrc|src/makemon.c|288|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。 [[野蛮人（玩家怪物）|野蛮人]]、[[骑士（玩家怪物）|骑士]]、[[牧师（玩家怪物）|牧师]]和[[女武神（玩家怪物）|女武神]]职业的[[玩家怪物]]在生成时有{{frac|18|155}}（约11.61%）的概率[[怪物起始物品|获得]]一件锁子甲{{refsrc|src/mplayer.c|174|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}{{refsrc|src/mplayer.c|201|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}{{refsrc|src/mplayer.c|215|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}{{refsrc|src/mplayer.c|242|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。 {{upcoming/zh-CN|NetHack 3.7.0|现在[[野蛮人]]的[[任务领袖]][[珀利阿斯]]生成时会获得一件+5锁子甲。}} == 描述 == 锁子甲的基础{{cnlink|AC}}加成为5，且能提供{{cnlink|MC}}1。 == 策略 == 锁子甲是件不错的防具，但比较重，且会阻碍[[施法]]。玩家若想在早期把AC压低，可以考虑利用锁子甲，直到找到更轻（例如[[秘银胶衣]]）或更适于施法（例如[[嵌皮甲]]或[[龙鳞甲]]）的铠甲。 == 历史 == 锁子甲自[[Jay Fenlason's Hack]]的衍生作品Hack 1.21和Hack for PDP-11开始就已存在于游戏中，也是[[Hack 1.0]]中最早加入游戏的物品之一。到[[NetHack 3.2.3]]为止，[[牧师]]职业的角色在游戏开始时会获得一件+0锁子甲，从[[NetHack 3.3.0]]开始则换成[[长袍]]。 == 起源 == {{wikipedia/zh-CN|Mail (armour)}} 锁子甲由许多小型金属环相扣组成，在欧洲、亚洲、北美洲等地，自古罗马前至19世纪都有使用。在中世纪，此类护甲仅用“mail”一词称呼——自19世纪的历史小说开始，该词才被用来描述其他类型的护甲（这也促成了“chain mail”一词被发明出来以专门描述锁子甲）。 NetHack中的锁子甲的设定均来自《[[龙与地下城]]》。 ==Variants== {{translation/zh-CN|n}} ===SLASH'EM=== In [[SLASH'EM]], the [[Undead Slayer]] has a {{frac|4}} chance of starting with chain mail as their body armor. Orcish Undead Slayers that would start with chain mail as their body armor receive orcish chain mail instead, making use of the existing substitution. A set of chain mail appears on the goal level of the [[Yeoman quest]], placed on the [[altar]] of the lawful [[temple]]. [[Upgrading]] orcish chain mail will produce regular chain mail, and vice versa. ===dNetHack=== In [[dNetHack]], [[notdNetHack]] and [[notnotdNetHack]], chain mail grants 2 base AC, 3 [[DR]] and MC1 while worn, and its weight is reduced to 150 aum. [[Dwarf (starting race)|Dwarven]] [[Binder (dNetHack role)|Binders]] always start with [[Erosion|thoroughly rusty]] chain mail, while Dwarven and female [[Half-dragon (starting race)|half-dragon]] [[Noble]]s will always start with standard chain mail. All non-[[Incantifier (dNetHack starting race)|Incantifier]] Knights start the game with chain mail - incantifier Knights are given a [[robe]] instead. [[Soldier ant]]s and [[queen bee]]s generated on the [[Law quest (dNetHack)|Lawful Quest]] have an effective {{frac|3|25}} chance of generating with chain mail. ===xNetHack=== In [[xNetHack]], [[Croesus]] has a {{frac|7|8}} chance of generating with [[Gold (material)|gold]] chain mail. ===EvilHack=== In [[EvilHack]], [[Champion (monster)|aligned champions]] and [[ronin]] have a {{frac|3}} chance of generating with chain mail. Chain mail may also be generated as part of various kits for player monsters, including [[Centaur (monster attribute)|centaurs]] (who can wear body armor in EvilHack). Chain mail can be created at a [[Forge (dungeon feature)|forge]] by combining two sets of [[ring mail]]. Chain mail can be used to forge a few items: * Chain mail can be combined with [[splint mail]] to create [[plate mail]]. * Chain mail can be combined with [[scale mail]] to create splint mail. * Chain mail can be combined with a [[dwarvish roundshield]] to create [[dwarvish chain mail]]. * Chain mail can be combined with an [[elven shield]] to create [[elven chain mail]]. ===Hack'EM=== In [[Hack'EM]], [[Giant (starting race)|giant]] Undead Slayers that would start with chain mail start with [[low boots]] instead, while [[Tortle (starting race)|tortle]] Undead Slayers receive [[leather gloves]] in place of chain mail. In addition to EvilHack details and forging recipes, upgrading orcish chain mail will produce regular chain mail and vice versa, as in SLASH'EM. == 引用及注释 == {{nethack-367/zh-CN}} [[Category:Body armor/zh-CN|SUOZIJIA]]
